title: Got shipping address WRONG
text: Got shipping address wrong. Hopefully caught in time!

title: Tongkat Ali capsules
text: I’ve been taking the Tongkat Ali capsules and so far I haven’t noticed any difference. I’m not sure if this stuff is legit or a scam or if I just need to take them for a longer period of time. I’ve been taking it for about a week or so, but will continue to take it for a longer period of time as directed to see if any Thing actually changes and if I feel a difference.

title: Disappointed

Also sent quite some time ago about guarantee on pine pollen and 3 tbls morning wood deal never heard back on that, however I do get regular emails about buying your products, as a company you might want to address that.

title: No response from Logans family i.e. his support staff
text: Order # 861998 on 27th April - Have been chasing on my shipment with no updates on route or USPS, LEH has not responded to my query whether or not if I will receive my shipment. Even the route packaging is billed when it should be under buyer protection. Very disappointed with their service. Last option would be to fill out the refund form.

title: Pine pollen has done NOTHING after a…
text: Pine pollen has done NOTHING after a week of mega dosing, except interrupt my ‘well-functioning’ sexual response.  It tastes terrible, hasn’t given any boost in energy, better sleep, or anything else the other ‘reviewers’ state it does.  I will not be purchasing any more, nor recommend it to anyone.  Like all the ads for this kind of stuff, this was a great way to get $25 from me- I’m ok with that- without any results.  Goodluck to anyone who thinks this is working for them:)

title: I never received what I paid for, but Empire made it right.
text: I never received what I paid for. Actually, I have received nothing. Very disappointed.However, I am happy to report that Lost Empire reached out to me immediately upon seeing my review, called me directly, and arranged to send me a replacement at no additional cost. Their response shows me that these folks are trustworthy and serious about earning people's business. I am looking forward to share my results.

title: Bad company
text: I placed an order with Lost Empire for Reishi mushroom, in December 2023 I received an order in a small bag with an expiration label of April 2023, the product is sold quite expensive but I did not buy it on Amazon because this company states that they grow their own natural products, but when I read the label it says: made in China. It is terrible. I do not recommend you to put your health and your money with this company I am really disappointed.

title: I ordered 2 bottles of the…
text: I ordered 2 bottles of the much-promoted pine pollen from the lost empire. The package arrived in the mail with 1 bottle completely smashed at the bottom. I threw it away and was left with one bottle. Upon examination, I discovered that the box did not have any protective shield inside to protect the bottles. That is very poor shipping practice to Canada. I had written an email about this and no response or complimentary bottle given. That is very poor customer service.

I will be filing a claim with my bank today, and allow them to handle it from here.

The packaging was not satisfactory as the bottle was not wrapped or secured for shipping. I am hoping that a customer service personnel of Lost Empire Herbs will call me and address this situation. CliffR

Until know it didn’t appear in my account it’s already July 11, 2018. I am totally disappointed with what happened to me. I could totally give -5 as my rating here.

title: Go figure, makes no sense.
text: All  received was an answering machine and nobody returned my call. Maybe your move was not such a good thing to do. This was unlike my previous experience. So sorry, it’s true. Maybe I’ll try again, it just left a bad taste for me.

title: Good herbal products, really poor customer service
text: Update: As per their response, I have received email about refund. But no refund and it has been over 10 days. Payment was via PayPal. It shouldn't take more than couple of days. Why on earth did I ever order from them!—---------------------------------------I purchased ebooks, but didn't find them to be satisfactory. Raised refund request, no response in 2 weeks. Sent email, no response. The refund guarantee is a fraud. I am reasonable.. I have used other products and never requested a refund unlike many who try to exploit the guarantee. But false guarantee and poor customer service just don't sit well with me.

title: Product on Hold
text: I have been ordering products from the US for over 2 decades and have never had any problems. I placed an order, and it was put on hold, for no reason. After I had sent an Email asking why my product was not shipped within 2 days, they said they needed to speak to me on the phone. Why? Is this the 1990s? You have gotten my money, you have my US address, why do we need to speak at all? I am an overseas client my timing is different and it costs alot of money to make overseas calls. They canceled the order and refunded. I ordered again and this time had a different billing and shipping address, they still put it on hold. I called them to "verify" the addresss even though I dont know why they are doing this. And now my second order is still on hold.

title: Did not have a good experience with my…
text: Did not have a good experience with my first order from Lost Empire Herbs as the order never arrived (international - Australia).To be fair that is beyond their control however their customer service has been unhelpful and they have not resolved the matter at all three months later.They dispatched and shipped the order quickly but then according to tracking it is still languishing in Chicago. Was advised to “wait” and then to “contact my local post office”.I acknowledge that occasionally items do get lost but in the rare instances that has happened to me it has always been resolved satisfactorily and with great customer service  by the seller, not “unfortunately, there is nothing we can do at this time”!

Andre

title: Sorry for this for you but it is the truth based on what I experienced.
text: The Tongkat Ali product that I purchased from you and may I say close to $200 (4 packets) worth was lackluster and I believe that you're many reviews are made up. I found the quality to be poor and lousy and that is the best that I can say about it. Compared to the product that I was already using, which name I will not reveal, I believe your product is just pure garbage. Please have it analyzed again. As a matter of fact I will be happy to have it analyzed for you and provide the results, after which you can provide me a refund of the analysis. Based on my free testosterone going up or Serene meaning level, it actually went down.I followed the directions explicitly as described on the package and they were encapsulated in gelatin capsules that were released into the intestinal area instead of being digested in stomach acid. I felt no different after two weeks. Consequently following these results I increased the dosage 25% and again felt no different then I did when I started the regimen.Later, in order to give your product the benefits of my doubt, I increase the dosage 75% which is almost twice the dosage and again felt no difference and after being tested, my free testosterone levels actually went down.In my opinion, and in my opinion alone, this product represented no benefit, and I believe that your positive reviews are made up or overhyped. Thus, I regret to inform you, I will never purchase a product from you again and if people ask me about my experience I will give them my honest answer. I  you will actually post this but hey, one never knows.
